comment: She was an amazing professor and I learned a lot. She is very knowledgeable and took time to explain things in more details.

Professor Preethy wants her students to succeed. If you dont understand the lectures, she tutors during officeLab hours, and she's very helpful. It was a challenging class all the same, and I had to learn a lot by myself.

Dr. Preethy is a nice professor, but it takes a while to get used to her teaching style. She has an accent but after a couple classes you will get used to it. She may pass as an easy professor but if you don't study on your own you will have a surprise the day of the test. Take advantage of office hours she is more than willing to help.

Nicest person in the world but her class isn't an easy A. She expects students to understand the material quickly as the course moves just as fast. You will have hard time with this class, but its all worth it in the end, because you'll know basic digital logic like the back of your hand. FSM!!!

Dr. Preethy is a nicest person I have met in this semester. She has very good knowledge about the course. She really pushes you and makes you work  and that is  a plus point because it really prepares you towards your bright future. She is really flexible and encourages to ask questions in class and in labs.

Prof. Pretty is hard to understand. She puts material on test that we did not cover.  She basically expects you to naturally know what is going on. Overall, I learned a little bit of something from her.

She is a very nice Professor and very easy going. She laughs and makes her students laugh as well. She really prepares you for the field in Digital circuits. She has good knowledge of materials and she allows students to ask questions any time in her class.

If you go to class to learn your field Dr. Preethy will prepare you for the future better than the other teachers.  If you go for an easy A, you're  in the wrong field.  I can definitely say I learned more in her class than the other students that took a different proffessor.   I would recommend her for students  who want to learn.

She is a very nice professor and willing to help. But she can get irritated of you do not grasp the material quick enough. She will stay with you until you understand the material. Just do not forget anything. Her accent is pretty heavy and talks fast. And sometimes, it is funny. As long as you come prepared, you should do fine.

She's a nice lady at heart, but her class is very rigorous. The material isn't complicated, its just really really hard to understand her sometimes. Be ready to figure out the labs on your own, which isn't easy if you don't have a background in digital logic. Be ready to take tests with material that was never mentioned in class.  continued post ..

Great Professor!. All you need to do is follow her classes, read notes. she provides lab manuals and provide guidance during lab sessions. She gives chances in several ways to boost your aggregate. she awards bonus points for active participation in classes. I would recommend.

Great Professor!. She explains clearly, does practice problems in class so we can understand and answers for every question. Just make sure you do your reading before class to prepare for lectures and take good notes and you will be fine. Final was easy if you follow her classes and read notes. she awards bonus point which accumulate for final.

Professor Preethy is very friendly and will go the extra mile to help you understand the material. She have flexible office hours to help you understand. If you apply yourself, you can learn a lot in Professor Preethy's class.  Her class projects are fun and enjoyable. They need more professors like her. I would love to take her class again.

She is very enthusiastic about the course subject matter in her lectures , and she is very helpful in lab. She is glad to give you extra help if you need it after class. She lets you choose your own project idea, so that you get to work on a project that interests you!
Dr Preethy has given nice knowledge about the study embedded PC. It is helpful at work.

Good teaching by Professor Preethy. She will active your research interest, and lead you to the right path if you want to do research or pursue a higher degree like Master or Ph.D. This thesis class will give you a good research experience and background. She will help you on the work, even if you do good, you can have the opportunity to publish it

Really have a solid understand and learn a lot from her class about digital logic and the lab will give you more understanding about digital circuit and digital logic design. Prof. Preethy gave a clear and make you understanding what she teach, if you learn diligently and do the homework carefully, you will earn a great grade.

Very kind professor and good lecture.  She will teach you clearly and make you understand. Listen and study carefully so that you will get a good grade because her clear, helpful instruction. She is really a good professor and can give you more instruction after class if you want to learn more. Also do the lab with your best effort, you learn a lot

This course get you A for sure if you follow her classes. Very friendly, always tries to be as clear as possible. Specially for electical major, she designed this programming course which give a very good intro to move forward :) thanks Preethy

I think this is the best class to get your rest in, sleep a little bit. There's no point in paying attention. She will knock you out better than sleeping pills. She talks and talks but nothing interesting. you'll be bored. Heard its an easy A. but she is very annoying. she takes lectures into lab periods.

If you want to learn Digital to apply toward a degree that will make you $$$ in the long run, DO NOT take Dr. Preethy! You will learn NOTHING!I may pass the class, yet, I will struggle through Digital II and Digital III. She doesn't use the text book.In the end, I've wasted lots of money on this class.Better to learn on your own rather than w/ her!

Didn't teach anything!!  Always late to class. Clearly had no lesson plan and does NOT know the subject material. Grades based on if she likes you. Almost never handed back tests or even told us our grades. Was NEVER clear about anything! I could go on and on. HORRIBLE!! SPSU fool me once shame on you, fool me twice shame on me...bye-bye
Horrible teacher but it is an easy A. She needs to retire

She's very friendly and helpful. Bonus points were usually given, minimum 1 or 2 per class :D However, she rushes through the material, but that didn't bug me much. Regardless, she makes herself available quite frequently if you are unsure about something. Knew what she was talking about most times. She puts out the effort, pretty good overall.

If you have the option to take someone other than her, DO IT! She teaches you absolutely nothing, and still messes up your grade in the end. She is absolutely the WORST teacher i have ever encountered and i honestly came out of that class feeling dumber and just plin out frustrated!!

Total waste of a semester.  I learned absolutely nothing. I did absolutely nothing.  The labs lasted at most 10min.  She couldn't get anything to work so she'd cancel the entire lab.  She is very friendly though.  Talk to her and you get your "A"! I really hate to say this but the ecet department needs more teachers like Dr. Zia that actually TEACH

I was so excited about this class, but then I got Preethy! We wasted the first half of the semester doing Digital 1 review and never learned anything new. If you want to learn don't get Preethy because you may know the same amount of knowledge as she does. The Blind leading the Blind!
